channel.title: The most cruel April Fools Joke ever...
channel.description:
[url]https://store.steamcommunity.com.ua/app/430/[/url] Don't forget to click on the picture to be even more disappointed.
EDIT: In hindsight, this belongs in the Half-Life forum. Oh fiddlesticks.

item.title: The most cruel April Fools Joke ever...
item.dc:creator: unix87
item.description:
At least it does not redirect to that Rebecca’s Friday thing.

I did not read the link to the “store” page at first and expected to be able to add it to my Steam wishlist, even though it would not change anything.

It would be better if the date was “3 March 2013”.

Read full topic

item.title: The most cruel April Fools Joke ever...
item.dc:creator: awmoose
item.description:
Maxey:

Who knows, this might be a small precedent for worst things in the future.

Anyway kids, the lesson here is, read the fucking thread title and the date it was posted on before making a stupid mistake like this.

Or, in less aggressive tones - take care before you post…

(also - WORSE, not worst…)

Read full topic

item.title: The most cruel April Fools Joke ever...
item.dc:creator: awmoose
item.description:
Maxey:

It’s just… What the fuck were people expecting out of a thread called “The most cruel April Fools [/SIZE][/SIZE] joke ever…”?

I mean seriously.[/SIZE][/SIZE][/SIZE]
[/SIZE]

Yeah, so? He got it wrong, does it matter? Is it worth berating him? It’s not like he screwed up a brain surgery or something…

Read full topic

item.title: The most cruel April Fools Joke ever...
item.dc:creator: awmoose
item.description:
I swear the Internet is the only place where people are so over-the-top, zero-tolerance merciless dicks. Screw up in real-life, most civilized people would forgive your oversight and move on - screw up on the internet, and you’d better be prepared for a shitstorm…

Read full topic

item.title: The most cruel April Fools Joke ever...
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
If someone hands me a wine bottle that says it has nothing but plain mineral water inside, drink from it and then slap the person who gave me the bottle because I thought it was really wine even though it clearly said it was filled with water, would that make me a reasonable person?

Read full topic

item.source: The most cruel April Fools Joke ever...

item.title: The most cruel April Fools Joke ever...
item.dc:creator: TrantaLocked
item.description:
It seriously had me going until I found a comment online saying the page is fake. What clever bastards.

Now we have people pretending to be valve, pretending to put out a release date as a pretend April Fools joke. Next, they will start making fake web pages pretending to be the impostors, but in reality are Valve.

Some people out there are so twisted I can’t even describe it. This is a very strange and cruel act.

Read full topic

item.source: The most cruel April Fools Joke ever...

item.title: The most cruel April Fools Joke ever...
item.dc:creator: deadbubble
item.description:
(rot)(fodder:

So…

You click on a thread called “APRIL FOOLS JOKE”, and then promptly believed the link inside.

Congrats like, I mean wow. You need a medal or something because this is an unprecedented low for human intelligence.

Please tell me you were trying to be funny and just completely failed instead.

I never believed it, I just noticed the date was 1 year from now, so I decided to comment about it.

Read full topic
